titles.title: A bill to reliquidate certain entries of lithotripters that were imported by nonprofit private or public institutions established for research or educational purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5941-5942)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/13/1993--Introduced. Provides, upon a request filed with the appropriate customs officer, for the liquidation or reliquidation (refund) of duties paid on certain extracorporeal shock wave lithotripters that were imported by nonprofit private or public institutions established for research or educational purposes between June 1 and September 30, 1992.
